effect.en: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 5 cards.
effect.fr: Mélangez votre main avec votre deck. Ensuite, piochez 5 cartes.
effect.es: Pon las cartas de tu mano en tu baraja y barájalas todas. Después, roba 5 cartas.
effect.it: Rimischia le carte che hai in mano nel tuo mazzo. Poi pesca cinque carte.
effect.pt: Embaralhe a sua mão no seu baralho. Em seguida, compre 5 cartas.
effect.de: Mische deine Handkarten in dein Deck. Ziehe anschließend 5 Karten.

description.en: It drives its opponents to exhaustion with its agile maneuvers, then ends the fight with a flashy finishing move.
